Name: Cannonship
About the game: I got a little plane. I call it Cannoship. I with my cannonship fight strange enemies to save the world Overview: Cannon ship is a classic shooter game but with modern touches! You must fight with huge number of enemies to save the world from annihilation. You don't seem to stand a chance, but by upgrade your ship you can destroy a bosses and many different enemies! Features: - 8 different sceneries - single player or local cooperation mode - upgrade your airship - achievements - support for game controllers - pixel art - retro difficulty level Cannonship is a game created by one person with only two hands :)
Meta Title: Cannonship: Jun 8, 2020, Two Hands Lab and Full Overview
